performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: Strong candidate in many ways. Her motivation is sincere and well-expressed, but the panel felt that she is not quite ready to begin the ITT programme. She has very specific experience working with KS5 pupils but needs to understand some of the conceptual problems that KS3 pupils experience so she can address them as a teacher. She is also part way through her OU maths degree and while this wonâ€™t be completed until 2025 (aprox) the panel felt that another year completing another unit would be extremely helpful and would ultimately make her a more effective maths teacher.
